Method Detail

translate

public void translate(java.lang.String inFilePath,
                      java.lang.String outFilePath,
                      Language language,
                      int languagewidth)
               throws java.io.FileNotFoundException,
                      java.io.IOException
Method translate Translates the thesaurus in file 'inFilePath' from language 'language' to UNL and writes the result to 'outFilePath'. 'languagewidth' is used for the intermediate mapping table where translations are stored.

Throws:
java.io.FileNotFoundException
java.io.IOException

printResultSet

private void printResultSet(java.sql.ResultSet result)
Method printResultSet Prints out the result set, if it is not empty.
